about_the_game:
The protagonist of this game, Mary Gold, works as a transporter for a small transport company. Her job involves not only transporting goods but also defending against desert raider attacks during the delivery.

One day, unlike her usual deliveries to lower and middle-class areas, she is assigned to transport goods to an upper-class district. Without questioning the nature of the goods she is transporting, she begins her journey. However, she soon notices an unusual increase in attacks from desert raiders, making her feel uneasy.

Mary immediately requests support from headquarters but is denied, leaving her with no choice but to summon mercenaries for help. Will she be able to protect the goods and reach her destination safely?



◆ Diverse Characters!!
Meet various characters while protecting your goods!!
Unlock sealed characters by progressing through specific storylines.



◆ Choose Your Way!!
Modify the train as you like and strategically position it!!
You can load the train to its maximum capacity for a heavy but stable arrival, or lighten the load for a faster but riskier journey!!

◆ Stronger!! Faster!!
Upgrade your train to reach your destination safely!
Enhance durability and defense through upgrades!
But be cautious—stronger trains become heavier,
which can negatively affect speed.
Choose your upgrades wisely!



◆ Join my team!
Hire and upgrade mercenaries!
When times are tough, mercenaries will always be by your side!
If you trust in their strength, you must protect them diligently!



◆ My strength is the key to arrival!
Upgrade yourself to reach the destination!
To protect the train and mercenaries, you must become stronger first.
If you can protect yourself, all objectives can be achieved!

The protagonist's wasteland adventure to transport crucial goods! Stay tuned!
